SMA.description: Average price over a specified period

EMA.description: Weighted moving average giving more importance to recent prices

WMA.description: Moving average with linearly increasing weights for newer data

DEMA.description: Moving average designed to reduce lag of traditional EMAs

TEMA.description: Moving average with reduced lag over traditional EMAs

TRIMA.description: Weighted moving average giving more weight to middle portion of the period

KAMA.description: Adapts to price volatility, moves faster in trending markets and slower in ranging markets

MAMA.description: Adapts to price action based on rate of change of phase

BBANDS.description: Volatility bands placed above and below a moving average

SAR.description: Stop and Reverse indicator used to determine trend direction and reversals

RSI.description: Momentum oscillator measuring speed and change of price movements (0-100)

MACD.description: Trend-following momentum indicator showing relationship between two moving averages

STOCH.description: Compares closing price to price range over a period (0-100)

STOCHRSI.description: Applies stochastic calculation to RSI values (0-100)

ADX.description: Measures strength of a trend regardless of direction (0-100)

ADXR.description: Smoothed version of ADX that measures trend strength (0-100)

CCI.description: Measures current price level relative to average price level over time

MOM.description: Rate of change in price over a specified period

ROC.description: Percentage change in price over a specified period

OBV.description: Cumulative total of volume based on price direction

AD.description: Volume-based indicator designed to measure cumulative flow of money into and out of a security

ADOSC.description: Measures momentum of the Accumulation/Distribution Line

ATR.description: Measures market volatility by decomposing the entire range of price movement

NATR.description: ATR normalized against closing price, expressed as a percentage

CDLENGULFING.description: Reversal pattern where a candle completely engulfs the prior candle

CDLDOJI.description: Indicates indecision where open and close are nearly equal

CDLHAMMER.description: Bullish reversal pattern with small body and long lower shadow
